attributes.action: only allow English MP's to vote on matters English.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Scotts have a parliament, the Welsh an assembly. The English have....a raw deal.

Why should the Scottish MP's in the English parliament be allowed to vote on matters English when the reverse is not?

I believe the English nation has been unfairly treated in many areas not least the funding received compared to the Scots and Welsh.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
